mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS USERS ( id int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, account varchar(32) UNIQUE, password varchar(32), name varchar(20), role varchar(10) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS INDEXS ( uuid CHAR(32) PRIMARY KEY, parent_uuid CHAR(32), name VARCHAR (254) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(10), suffix VARCHAR(20), is_dir BOOLEAN NOT NULL, l_update DATETIME NOT NULL, size BIGINT )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MD5( md5 CHAR(32), uuid CHAR(32) PRIMARY KEY, CONSTRAINT fk FOREIGN KEY(uuid) REFERENCES INDEXS(uuid) )
